text: The 2019 Belgian Athletics Championships (, ) was the year's national outdoor track and field championships for Belgium. It was held on 31 August and 1 September at the King Baudouin Stadium in Brussels. The national championships in 10,000 metres and women's 3000 metres steeplechase took place on Saturday 4 May in Oudenaarde.
